targets.sql: SELECT Max(`metrics.cpu_percent`) AS `max`, Percentile(`metrics.cpu_percent`,0.99) AS `p99`, Percentile(`metrics.cpu_percent`,0.95) AS `p95`, Percentile(`metrics.cpu_percent`,0.9) AS `p90`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_monitor WHERE `tag.host` IN ('DF-DAILY-R0-C1') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: CPU statistics for all selected agents (100=1C)

targets.sql: SELECT Max(`metrics.memory`) AS `max`, Percentile(`metrics.memory`,0.99) AS `p99`, Percentile(`metrics.memory`,0.95) AS `p95`, Percentile(`metrics.memory`,0.9) AS `p90`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_monitor WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

panels.title: Memory statistics for all selected agents

targets.sql: SELECT ((Sum(`metrics.tx-bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `tx-bps`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT ((Avg(`metrics.tx-bytes`)*8)/10) AS `tx-bytes`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` = 'node1-V1' AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `tag.host`, `tag.type` ORDER BY `tx-bytes` desc LIMIT 20

SELECT ((Percentile(`metrics.tx-bytes`,0.9)*8)/10) AS `Math(Math(Percentile(metrics.tx-bytes,0.9)*8)/10)`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` = 'node1-V1' AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `tag.host`, `tag.type` ORDER BY `Math(Math(Percentile(metrics.tx-bytes,0.9)*8)/10)` desc LIMIT 20

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.kern_lost`)/$__interval) AS `kern-drop`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_ebpf_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.user_dequeue_count`)/$__interval) AS `dequeue`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_ebpf_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.description: Once the reclaim-max is reached, the recovery mechanism will start to delete the data that is too old.

targets.sql: SELECT Min(`metrics.kern_socket_map_used`) AS `used`, Max(`metrics.kern_socket_map_max`) AS `limit`, Max(`metrics.socket_map_max_reclaim`) AS `reclaim-max`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_ebpf_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: kern_socket_map

panels.description: Displays the maximum number of entries in the socket tracking hash table and the number of entries currently in use.

targets.sql: SELECT Min(`metrics.kern_trace_map_used`) AS `used`, Max(`metrics.kern_trace_map_max`) AS `limit`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_ebpf_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: kern_trace_map

panels.description:
adapt: 1 kernel adaptation succeeds,   0 kernel adaptation fails.
tracer_state: TRACER_INIT(0), TRACER_RUNNING(1),  TRACER_STOP(2).
perf_pages: Number of pages occupied by the perf buffer memory.
worker-num: The number of worker threads processing the data.
panels.title: Configuration

targets.sql: SELECT (Sum(`metrics.rx`)/$__interval) AS `rx`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_dispatcher WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Packet Drops in Kernel (Agent Can't Process)

targets.sql: SELECT ((Sum(`metrics.rx_bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `rx`, ((Sum(`metrics.tx_bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `tx`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.name` FROM deepflow_agent_net WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','DF-DAILY-R0-D1-W55','DF-DAILY-R0-C1-W56','huanchao-test-metaflow-H7','huanchao-linux-H2','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','jiawei-centos-node7-V3','huanchao-VirtualBox','jiawei-centos-node6-V5','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','huanchao-windows-H1','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.name` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.rx`)/$__interval) AS `rx`, (Sum(`metrics.tx`)/$__interval) AS `tx`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.name` FROM deepflow_agent_net WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.name` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Max(`metrics.max_bucket`) AS `buckets`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.module`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_double_key_lru WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.module`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000
SELECT * FROM deepflow_agent_tcp_packet_sender WHERE time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' LIMIT 100

SELECT ((Sum(`metrics.tx_bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `tx`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_npb_packet_sender WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT ((Sum(`metrics.in_bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `Before`, ((Sum(`metrics.out_bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `After`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.mac`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_fragmenter WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.mac`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

targets.query: SELECT sum("value")  / 60 FROM "trident_dedup_missed" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "trident_dedup_load_factor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "trident_dedup_load_factor" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "host" fill(null)

targets.sql: SELECT Max(`metrics.window-delay`) AS `window_delay`, Max(`metrics.flow-delay`) AS `flow_delay`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_quadruple_generator WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Max(`metrics.window-delay`) AS `window_delay`, Max(`metrics.flow-delay`) AS `flow_delay`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.no-endpoint`) AS `no-endpoint`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_quadruple_generator WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.drop-before-window`)/$__interval) AS `drops`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_quadruple_generator WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.drop-before-window`)/$__interval) AS `drops`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.out`)/$__interval) AS `out`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` FROM deepflow_agent_collector WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index`, `tag.kind` SLIMIT 20

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.drop-before-window`)/$__interval) AS `drops`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.out`)/$__interval) AS `out`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.drop-in-throttle`)/$__interval) AS `drops`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node2-V2','node1-V1','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.throttle-drop`)/$__interval) AS `drops`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_l7_session_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.send-before-window`)/$__interval) AS `send`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_l7_session_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.cached`) AS `cached`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_l7_session_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.merge`)/$__interval) AS `merged`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_l7_session_aggr WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.dropped`)/$__interval) AS `Math(Sum(metrics.dropped)/$__interval)`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.tx`)/$__interval) AS `tx`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT ((Sum(`metrics.tx-bytes`)*8)/$__interval) AS `tx-bps`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` FROM deepflow_agent_collect_sender WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Avg(`metrics.tx_bps`) AS `tx`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_npb_bandwidth_watcher WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.new`)/$__interval) AS `new`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.closed`)/$__interval) AS `closed`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.drop_by_window`) AS `drop_by_window`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE (`tag.host` = 'node1-V1' OR `tag.host` = 'node2-V2' OR `tag.host` = 'node27-V6' OR `tag.host` = 'master26-V7' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-linux-H2' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-VirtualBox' OR `tag.host` = 'ydx-H3' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-C1' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-D1' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-master26-W44' OR `tag.host` = 'node27' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-node27-W43' OR `tag.host` = 'master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Avg(`metrics.concurrent`) AS `concurrent`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Avg(`metrics.slots`) AS `slots`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Avg(`metrics.avg_scan`) AS `slots_avg_scan`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Max(`metrics.slot_max_depth`) AS `slot_max_depth`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_map WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT (Sum(`metrics.in`)/$__interval) AS `in`, (Sum(`metrics.out`)/$__interval) AS `out`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` FROM deepflow_agent_queue WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND `tag.module` IN ('1-prometheus-to-sender','2-second-flow-to-minute-aggrer','1-tagged-flow-to-app-protocol-logs','1-telegraf-to-sender','2-flow-with-meter-to-second-collector','2-packet-sequence-block-to-sender','0-stats-to-sender','1-packet-sequence-block-to-parser','2-protolog-to-collector-sender','3-doc-to-collector-sender','1-otel-to-sender','1-compressed-otel-to-sender','3-flowlog-to-collector-sender','2-flow-with-meter-to-minute-collector','1-tagged-flow-to-quadruple-generator','1-profile-to-sender','1-mini-meta-packet-to-pcap-handler','2-pcap-batch-to-sender','1-otel-metrics-to-collector','1-proc-event-to-sender','3-protolog-to-collector-sender','3-flow-to-collector-sender','1-mini-meta-packet-to-pcap','2-doc-to-collector-sender') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.index` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.ignore_packet_count`) AS `ignored`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_perf WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.invalid_packet_count`) AS `invalid`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_perf WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

SELECT Sum(`metrics.l7_mismatch_response`) AS `mismatched`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` FROM deepflow_agent_flow_perf WHERE `tag.host` IN ('node1-V1','node2-V2','node27-V6','master26-V7','huanchao-linux-H2','huanchao-VirtualBox','ydx-H3','DF-DAILY-R0-C1','DF-DAILY-R0-D1','DeepflowQA-master26-W44','node27','DeepflowQA-node27-W43','master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.id` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.description: Various gRPC call delays, time from making a request to receiving a response

targets.sql: SELECT Avg(`metrics.avg_delay`) AS `avg`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.endpoint` FROM deepflow_agent_grpc_call WHERE (`tag.host` = 'node1-V1' OR `tag.host` = 'node2-V2' OR `tag.host` = 'node27-V6' OR `tag.host` = 'master26-V7' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-linux-H2' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-VirtualBox' OR `tag.host` = 'ydx-H3' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-C1' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-D1' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-master26-W44' OR `tag.host` = 'node27' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-node27-W43' OR `tag.host` = 'master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host`, `tag.endpoint` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: gRPC call delay

targets.sql: SELECT Avg(`metrics.compressed_ratio`) AS `ratio`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_integration_collector WHERE (`tag.host` = 'node1-V1' OR `tag.host` = 'node2-V2' OR `tag.host` = 'node27-V6' OR `tag.host` = 'master26-V7' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-linux-H2' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-VirtualBox' OR `tag.host` = 'ydx-H3' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-C1' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-D1' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-master26-W44' OR `tag.host` = 'node27' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-node27-W43' OR `tag.host` = 'master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

panels.title: Open Telemetry Trace data compressed ratio

targets.sql: SELECT Avg(`metrics.compressed`) AS `compressed`, Avg(`metrics.uncompressed`) AS `uncompressed`, time(time, 10) AS `time_10`, `tag.host` FROM deepflow_agent_integration_collector WHERE (`tag.host` = 'node1-V1' OR `tag.host` = 'node2-V2' OR `tag.host` = 'node27-V6' OR `tag.host` = 'master26-V7' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-linux-H2' OR `tag.host` = 'huanchao-VirtualBox' OR `tag.host` = 'ydx-H3' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-C1' OR `tag.host` = 'DF-DAILY-R0-D1' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-master26-W44' OR `tag.host` = 'node27' OR `tag.host` = 'DeepflowQA-node27-W43' OR `tag.host` = 'master26') AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_10`, `tag.host` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 10000

show tag tag.module values from deepflow_agent_queue
